description: Main application widget file for the Flutter-based Memory Keeper app, including app initialization, theming, navigation, persistent tab state, and provider setup.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget for the app that sets up providers, themes, and initial route.

classes.name: AppRoot
classes.description: Stateful widget managing bottom tab navigation, tab persistence, and initial data loading.

classes.name: _NotesTab
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the Notes tab content.

classes.name: _WalletTab
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the Wallet tab content.

classes.name: _PlaceholderTab
classes.description: Generic card-based UI placeholder for each tab's content.

methods.name: _createNotesProvider
methods.description: Creates and returns an instance of NotesProvider.

methods.name: _createWalletProvider
methods.description: Creates and returns an instance of WalletProvider.

methods.name: _loadSelectedTab
methods.description: Loads the last selected tab index from SharedPreferences asynchronously.

methods.name: _persistSelectedTab
methods.description: Saves the current tab index to SharedPreferences asynchronously.

methods.name: _onItemTapped
methods.description: Handles tab selection changes and updates preferences.

methods.name: _buildFabForTab
methods.description: Builds floating action button based on current tab, with placeholder actions.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and AppRoot, including provider setup, navigation, and initial data load.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state, loads persisted tab index, and triggers provider data initialization.
